Requirement: The actuator devices should have the ability to scale their actuation precision and response time based on changing system requirements
The system should provide secure and reliable firmware updates to all devices
The system should support dynamic actuator grouping and orchestration to perform coordinated actions across multiple devices
The system should have the ability to prevent malware infections from future devices
The system shall store firmware and software updates for remote device management and updates
The system should be able to dynamically allocate resources and prioritize actuator actions based on real-time demands
The system shall include a motorized camera system for tracking and monitoring movements in a surveillance application
